Title: Relates to instant run-off voting in the city of New York; repealer
Summary: Repeals the current system for run-off primary elections in the city of New York and replaces it with an instant run-off voting system by having voters rank candidates in order of preference.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง6-162, amd ยง7-114, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to instant run-off voting in the city of New York; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
